Detailed Description

Controller Class.

Brief Description: The "Controller" class serves as a foundational template for developing autonomous vehicle controller classes. It is intended for use as a base class, and its methods, as defined in the interface class, are crucial for implementing and testing autonomous vehicle control.

Author
Pawarat Phatthanaphusakun
Version
1.01
Date
2023-08-28

none

EVERYONE MUST NOT change this class (the header file)

void Controller::AssignTarget ( const std::string &  target)
